transbit.tbits.searcher
Class SqlConditionEncapsulator

java.lang.Object
  transbit.tbits.searcher.SqlConditionEncapsulator

public class SqlConditionEncapsulator
extends java.lang.Object

This class encapsulates the sql conditions that need to be appended to the final query of the searcher. The AND'ed and OR'ed queries are stored seperately.

Author:
Karan Gupta
